Brooklyn Historical Society
Jackie Weisberg's Gowanus Impressions photographs
Weisberg, Jackie
2011.008
177 Megabytes in 42 digital files.
2009 This collection includes 27 digital photographs by Jackie Weisberg depicting the neighborhood of Gowanus. digital files
Conditions Governing Access
This collection is open for research without restriction.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright to this collection has not been assessed. Please contact library@brooklynhistory.org for more information.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Jackie Weisberg's Gowanus Impressions photographs, 2011.008, Box and Folder number; Center for Brooklyn History at Brooklyn Public Library.
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Access to digital materials is avaialble onsite at the Othmer Library. Request to access born digital materials must be made at least 2 days in advance by emailing library@brooklynhistory.org
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Jackie Weisberg in 2011.
Gowanus (New York, N.Y.) Carroll Street (Brooklyn, N.Y.) Digital Photographs
